description:
Iida Kenzou is a student at the Tokyo Metropolitan Mitogawa High School and a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch145182 [Kusakabe Kanna]. He is very close with http://anidb.net/ch148711 [Ugumori Ayano], a girl from a different class. His family has dealt in paper wholesale for generations. Because of this Ayano`s rich and full-of-pride father, http://anidb.net/ch148707 [Souichi], is opposed to their relationship as he doesn`t want his daughter to marry the son of a simple tradesman.
He helps Ayano "disappear" so she can reunite with her mother, http://anidb.net/ch148708 [Etsuko], who was secretely living in Nagano.
name: Iida Kenzou
